TopicTitle: Do KSP savefiles contain craft files too?

Articles.Content:
My laptop got [CENSORED] and now it's just... dead... Can't charge it, can't turn it on... And I'm in need of a new laptop (different question: when will I buy one?). So.

If I transfer a savefile (for Mango Aerospace) from E: (E:? Yes I had to replace my D:) to wherever I download KSP on a different laptop, will the craft files be automatically generated when I boot up the game?
Craft files go into KSP/saves/<your save name>/Ships, the save files themselves (.sfs) are in KSP/saves/<your save name> so moving the folder from KSP/saves will get everything.
